text: , better known as Mr. Sakurada, The Dragonmaster, and as the Japanese version of , was a Japanese professional wrestler. He was best known for his work in Stampede Wrestling, National Wrestling Alliance, and World Championship Wrestling. On January 11, 2020, Sakurada died at age 71 due to arrhythmia. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Japanese professional wrestlers Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrhythmia
title: Kazuo Sakurada
